channel.title: New Typer idea
channel.description:
Ok... I have an Idea for a Typing Program... It's not [i]exactly[/i] an autotyper, but it has a few boxes that you type in: 1. What you're buying/selling, 2. How much you are buyin/sellin it for, 3. your "thanx", "tyvm", "thx dood" (thank-you message) with a few radio buttons for the text color and/or effects.
Technaclly it is suppost to be a form made with the versions of SCAR that support them (I have V. 3.11), and all you press is Enter, or if you don't wanna type or press enter, it auto's for you so all you have to do is see if sum1 trades. ( With the Up-dated runescape, you may wanna have it accept the trade by clicking on the purple text or pressing the "trade's" button at the near-bottom right next to the report-abuse button) If Any1 wants to try sumthin like that, go for it.
Basicly all it has is a few textboxes to type you're info, radio buttons for colors(glow3,flash2) and effects(slide,shake) and a checkbox that if checked, it automaticly types, and [b]Make sure it mispells the words!!![/b] except the price of course! :D

item.title: New Typer idea
item.dc:creator: @kitty-man kitty-man
item.description:
@kitty-man wrote:

Ok… I have an Idea for a Typing Program…
It’s not exactly an autotyper, but it has
a few boxes that you type in:

  1. What you’re buying/selling,
  2. How much you are buyin/sellin it for,
  3. your “thanx”, “tyvm”, “thx dood” (thank-you message)
    with a few radio buttons for the text color and/or effects.

Technaclly it is suppost to be a form made with the versions
of SCAR that support them (I have V. 3.11),
and all you press is Enter, or if you don’t wanna type or press enter, it auto’s for you
so all you have to do is see if sum1 trades. ( With the Up-dated runescape, you may wanna
have it accept the trade by clicking on the purple text or pressing the “trade’s” button at the
near-bottom right next to the report-abuse button)
If Any1 wants to try sumthin like that, go for it.

Basicly all it has is a few textboxes to type you’re info,
radio buttons for colors(glow3,flash2) and effects(slide,shake)
and a checkbox that if checked, it automaticly types,
and Make sure it mispells the words!!! except the price of course!
